hero.title: Our Clients
hero.intro: We believe that the key to the company's success is putting the client's needs first.
hero.paragraph1: In partnership with our subcontractors and suppliers, we offer solutions that fully meet the clients' desires. We work with materials and equipment of proven quality from leading Bulgarian and international manufacturers.
hero.paragraph2: In the implementation of projects, we apply all modern technologies and materials established in the construction practice and strive to meet the highest client requirements in terms of quality and price.
hero.paragraph3: We value our clients and build partnerships with them, striving to find a flexible and individual solution for each of them, professionally and responsibly executing our projects with quality and on time.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. is a construction company with 100% private capital, founded at the end of 2007.
about.description: The company specializes in construction, repair and rehabilitation of buildings, as well as in the development of transport, hydraulic, energy and landscaping infrastructure.
about.registry: Since 2008, the company has been registered in the Central Professional Register of Builders at the Chamber of Builders in Bulgaria and is authorized to execute construction works in all construction groups in accordance with national legislation.

machinery.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. possesses a wide range of specialized construction machinery that meets modern standards for safety and efficiency.
machinery.description: Our machinery includes modern heavy and specialized equipment from leading manufacturers. Each machine is maintained in excellent technical condition and operated by experienced operators to ensure maximum efficiency and safety on the construction site.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the website of **Techno Stroy Bulgaria** Ltd. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and process your data when using the contact form.

dataCollection.title: 3. What Data We Collect
dataCollection.note: **Note:** We do not collect IP addresses, tracking cookies or analytics data.

dataUsage.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use your data solely to respond to your inquiry and communicate regarding construction services.
legalItems: **Art. 6(1)(a)** - Your explicit consent (from the contact form)
**Art. 6(1)(b)** - Performance of a contract or taking steps at your request

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: Your data may be shared with:
items: **Resend.com** (email provider) - for sending messages from the form
dataSharing.note: **Note:** All providers outside the EU use Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) approved by the EU.

retention.title: 6. Retention Period
retention.content: Emails from the contact form are stored for up to **1 year** after receipt, unless longer retention is necessary for contract performance or legal obligation.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR you have the right to:
items: **Erasure** of your data ("right to be forgotten")

complaint.title: Right to lodge a complaint with supervisory authority:

contact.title: 8. Contact for Exercising Rights
contact.intro: To exercise your rights or inquire about data processing:
contact.responseTime: We will respond to your request within **1 month** pursuant to Art. 12 of GDPR.

whatAreCookies.title: 2. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when visiting a website. They are used to improve website functionality and efficiency.

cookiesUsed.title: 3. What Cookies We Use
cookiesUsed.important: **Important:** Our website **DOES NOT use** marketing cookies, analytics cookies (Google Analytics) or behavior tracking cookies.

technical.title: 3.1 Technically Necessary Cookies
technical.content: Next.js (the website platform) may use temporary session cookies for contact form functionality and security. These cookies are technically necessary and are deleted when the browser closes.

googleMaps.title: 3.2 Google Maps Cookies
googleMaps.intro: We use Google Maps to display our location on the contacts page. Google Maps may set the following cookies:
googleMaps.note: **Note:** These cookies are set by Google when loading the map and are technically necessary for its functionality. For more information see [Google's Cookie Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies).

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: According to Art. 5(3) of Directive 2002/58/EC (ePrivacy), technically necessary cookies that are strictly necessary to provide a service explicitly requested by you (such as displaying a location on a map) **do not require prior consent**.

management.title: 5. How to Manage Cookies
management.intro: You can block or delete cookies through your browser settings:
browsers: **Google Chrome:** Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
management.warning: **Important:** Blocking cookies may interfere with Google Maps functionality on the contacts page.

additionalInfo.title: 6. Additional Information
additionalInfo.content: For information regarding the processing of personal data (name, email, phone from the contact form), please see our [Privacy Policy](/privacy).
